attributes.action: Celebration of the patron saint of  England
attributes.additional_details:
The division within the English public gives credence to a lack of solidarity and direction. This has been evidenced by significant ventures in flag planting in public (roads n street lamps). Parliament needs to recognise, support, and nurture
future generations and their patriotism .
attributes.background: The government to legislate a public holiday to celebrate the patron saint of England,  St George. Which should be as near to 23rd April (St George's saint day) as possible.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/739078
